title: As a Intl MNC Admin, I want the Parental Consent Rule updated
custom_steps:
Related to: [https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/PIVOTAL-2095|https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/PIVOTAL-2095|smart-link] 

Rule 5.23: [https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3784601/5.+Minor+Contract+-+onSubmit|https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3784601/5.+Minor+Contract+-+onSubmit|smart-link] 

AC:

* Rule 5.23 will be updated from â€œIf the player is under 21 as of the contract signing date And Parental/Guardian Consent field is not populatedShow hard errorâ€�
** to
* If the player is under 18 as of the contract signing date And Parental/Guardian Consent field is not populatedShow hard error

title: As a BOC Admin, I want Players who Sign pior to the 3A Championship Date to receive a MN Contract year
custom_steps:
* If a player signs the first contract prior to the 3A Championship season date, they will be given a MN contract year
** If the player signs after their season ends, but prior to the 3A Championship season date, they will still be given a MN contract year

title: As a BOC Admin, I want Players who Sign pior to the 3A Championship Date to be credited with a year of Rule 5 Eligibility
custom_steps:
AC:

* If a player signs the first contract prior to the 3A Championship season date, the year will count towards their Rule 5 Eligibility
** If the player signs after their season ends, but prior to the 3A Championship season date, the year will count towards their Rule 5 Eligibility

title: As a League Econ user I want to calculate a True Up value if necessary when a player option is declined
custom_steps:
Playerâ€™s with a guaranteed player option (opt out) that lowers their CBT rate will incur a True Up charge in the option year if that option year is declined.  Its also possible that there will be multiple option years declined (a player like Gerrit Cole would have been in that situation if he had opted out of his Yankee contract).

The True Up value is the difference between the total guaranteed player option year salaries (the value that contributed to the CBT rate) and the CBT charges in all non option years.

There were three relevant players in 2024: Manaea, Martinzez, and Snell (see attached spreadsheet for accounting)

** Display all Option Years

title: As a BOC Admin, I want to be Notified about Outstanding International Contracts and Investigation Requests
custom_steps:
AC:

* An email will be sent to recipients encompassing multiple updates/reminders if applicable:
** If an International Contract status is Terms Submitted or Terms Accepted, no contract has been uploaded, and it has been at least 18 days from the terms agreed upon date
** If an International Contract status is Terms Submitted or Terms Accepted, there has been no requested or waived investigation, and it has been at least 18 days from the terms agreed upon date
** If an International Contract status is Terms Submitted or Terms Accepted, the investigation status is Completed or Confirmed, a contract has been uploaded, and it has been at least 3 days since the investigation completion date
** If an International Investigation Request status has been changed to â€œUpdate Needed,â€� and it has been at least 15 days since the status has been updated
* The email will read:
** Subject: Action Needed: International Contracts & Investigations
** Body (Paragraph Form, Not Bulleted):
*** The following players have submitted terms, but have no uploaded contract:
**** *Player Last, First* (ORG)(EBIS ID) - X days since terms were agreed to
**** *Player Last First* (ORG)(EBIS ID) - {color:#ff5630}X days since terms were agreed to{color}
** 
*** The following players have submitted terms, but no investigation has been requested or waived:
**** *Player Last, First* (ORG)(EBIS ID) - X days since terms were agreed to
**** *Player Last First* (ORG)(EBIS ID) - {color:#ff5630}X days since terms were agreed to{color}
** 
*** The following players have submitted terms and a completed/confirmed investigation:
**** *Player Last, First* (ORG)(EBIS ID) - X days since investigation was completed
**** *Player Last First* (ORG)(EBIS ID) - {color:#ff5630}X days since investigation was completed{color}
** 
*** The following players have an Investigation Request status of â€œUpdate Needed,â€� but no updates have been made:
**** *Player Last, First* (ORG)(EBIS ID) - X days since status was updated
**** *Player Last First* (ORG)(EBIS ID) - {color:#ff5630}X days since status was updated{color}
* Note: If it has been 20+ days since the terms were agreed to, please have the text displayed in {color:#ff5630}red{color}
* Note: If it has been 4+ days since the investigation was completed, please have the text displayed in {color:#ff5630}red{color}
* Note: If it has been 18+ days since the investigation request status was updated to â€œUpdate Needed,â€� please have the text displayed {color:#ff5630}red{color}
* Recipients:
** BOC users who are subscribed to the â€œContract & Investigation Updatesâ€� notification category under the International section of the EBIS Email Utility
* Frequency: The system should run a daily check, and generate one email each day

title: As a Club, I want to be Notified about Outstanding International Contracts and Investigation Requests
custom_steps:
AC:

* An email will be sent to recipients encompassing multiple updates/reminders if applicable:
** If an International Contract status is Terms Submitted or Terms Accepted, no contract has been uploaded, and it has been at least 18 days from the terms agreed upon date
** If an International Contract status is Terms Submitted or Terms Accepted, there has been no requested or waived investigation, and it has been at least 18 days from the terms agreed upon date
** If an International Investigation Request status has been changed to â€œUpdate Needed,â€� and it has been at least 15 days since the status has been updated
* The email will read:
** Subject: Action Needed: International Contracts & Investigations
** Body (Paragraph Form, Not Bulleted):
*** You have submitted terms for the following players, but a contract has not yet been uploaded. As a reminder, in accordance with Major League Rule 3(e)(2), contracts must be submitted within 20 days of term agreement or the player may be declared a Free Agent:
**** *Player Last, First* (EBIS ID) - X days since terms were agreed to
**** *Player Last First* (EBIS ID) - {color:#ff5630}X days since terms were agreed to{color}
** 
*** You have submitted terms for the following players, but no investigation has been requested or waived:
**** *Player Last, First* (EBIS ID) - X days since terms were agreed to
**** *Player Last First* (EBIS ID) - {color:#ff5630}X days since terms were agreed to{color}
** 
*** The following players have an Investigation Request status of â€œUpdate Needed,â€� but no updates have been made: 
**** *Player Last, First* (EBIS ID) - X days since status was updated
**** *Player Last First* (EBIS ID) - {color:#ff5630}X days since status was updated{color}
* Note: If it has been 20+ days since the terms were agreed to, please have the text displayed in {color:#ff5630}red{color}
* Note: If it has been 18+ days since the investigation request status was updated to â€œUpdate Needed,â€� please have the text displayed in {color:#ff5630}red{color}
* Recipients:
** Club users who are subscribed to the â€œContract & Investigation Request Updatesâ€� notification category under the International section of the EBIS Email Utility
* Frequency: The system should run a daily check, and generate one email per club each day

title: Add a new Category on the International Section of the Email Utility
custom_steps:
AC:

* There will be a new category on the Email Utility under the â€œInternationalâ€� section

* This category will be called â€œContract & Investigation Request Updatesâ€�

title: As an Intl MNC Admin, I do not want the Parental Consent Page to Print if the Player is Over 18
custom_steps:
Currently, if a player is under 21 years of age, the international first year contract that prints contains a Parents or Guardian Consent page as the last page of the contract.

AC:

* If a player is 18 years of age or older, the Parents or Guardian Consent page will not print as part of their MNC
* If a player is 17 years of age or younger, the Parents or Guardian Consent page will print

title: As a MJC Admin, I want to be notified if a player's MNC has Custom Language
custom_steps:
Related to [https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/PIVOTAL-2073|https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/PIVOTAL-2073|smart-link]

AC:

* If a Major League contract is submitted for a player that has an Minor Contract in Approved state that contains custom language, the system will provide a Clipboard Flag notifying users:
** Player has a Minor Contract that contains custom language

title: As a MJC Admin, I want to be notified if a MJC Contract has MJ Terms that do not match the MNC
custom_steps:
Related to: [https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/PIVOTAL-2072|https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/PIVOTAL-2072|smart-link] 

AC: 

* If a MJC that is submitted with MJ Terms that were auto-populated by a MNC, the system will compare the submitted terms to the MNC.
* If the terms do not match the MNC, the system will provide a Clipboard Flag notifying users:
** MJ terms do not match existing MNC
* If the MNC has an MJ Interpreter clause (which canâ€™t be displayed on the MJC) then the system will provide a Clipboard Flag notifying users:
** MNC contains a Major interpreter clause which was not automatically reflected on this contract
* If the MNC has a language associated with an MJ term the system will provide a Clipboard Flag notifying users that the language is not reflected on the MJC:
** MNC contains <MJ TERM> language which was not automatically reflected on this contract
* If the MNC has a Award bonus maximum (which cannot be converted directly to an MJC bonus max):
** MNC contains an Award bonus maximum which was not automatically reflected on this contract
* If the MNC has a Performance bonus maximum (which cannot be converted directly to an MJC bonus max):
** MNC contains a Performance bonus maximum which was not automatically reflected on this contract

title: As a MJC Admin, I want MJ Terms from a MNC Autopopulated in a new MJC
custom_steps:
Context: Currently, in the event a player with MJ terms in his MNC is selected to the MJ Roster, Club users need to manually enter those terms into the new MJC.  This can lead to omission of the terms or errors while entering them.

AC:

* If a MJC is created for a player that has a MNC in approved state which contains MJ terms, the MJ terms will be auto-populated on the new MJC
* This includes any of the Major League terms in a MNC:
** Major League Base Salary
** Minor League Assignment Salary
** Performance Bonuys
** Award Bonus
** Major League Miscellaneous
** Interpreter

title: Create a framework for displaying and running screenshot versions of reports from the reporting tab
custom_steps:
The reporting widget will be able to display and run reports built using screenshots (instead of business objects).

Report definition will be configured using a SQL file (similar to batches).

Prompts will be displayed using an ebis modal and this should be part of the report configuration.  There should be two ways of setting up the prompts - a custom modal accessed by a â€˜nameâ€™ or a generic modal using a child table to configure the prompts.

title: SPIKE: Consider using BAM logos in EBIS
custom_steps: EBIS has its own set of logos which are not from BAM. Other EP/BEST systems use BAM logos. Should we do the same to be consistent? Need to look at possible impacts to reports.

* The portal should be linked to playerâ€™s CEP/CSP EBIS statuses to populate accurate data

title: Convert Drug Test Requests reg tab to React
custom_steps:
Drug Test Requests page needs to be updated to React, all features should work the same on ebisui and ebisapp.



During the conversion, can we add a Header Filter for Request Date, similar to the Reg Admin?

From date would default to Jan 1 of the current year

To date would default to current date.
